# GCExtendedGamepadSnapshot

**Class**

A recording of all of the values provided by a [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCExtendedGamepad] object.

## Declaration

```swift
class GCExtendedGamepadSnapshot
```

## Overview

To create a gamepad snapshot, call the [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCExtendedGamepad/saveSnapshot()] method on a [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCExtendedGamepad] object. The [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCExtendedGamepadSnapshot] class is a subclass of the [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCExtendedGamepad] class, so you use the parent class’s properties to read the individual element values. The snapshot is stored in a device independent format. To get the flattened data representation of the snapshot data, read the [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCExtendedGamepadSnapshot/snapshotData] property.

## Converting Between Extended Snapshots and Data Objects

- **init(snapshotData:)**: Initializes a snapshot object with the flattened data representation obtained from another snapshot.
- **init(controller:snapshotData:)**: Initializes a snapshot object associated with a specific controller using a flattened data representation obtained from another snapshot.
- **snapshotData**: Flattens a snapshot into an archivable memory representation.

## Flattening a Snapshot to Memory

- **GCExtendedGamepadSnapShotDataV100**: A structure that holds a snapshot of an extended gamepad controller’s input data.
- **NSDataFromGCExtendedGamepadSnapShotDataV100(_:)**: Encapsulates the controller data from an extended gamepad structure into a data object.
- **GCExtendedGamepadSnapShotDataV100FromNSData(_:_:)**: Copies the recorded data from an extended gamepad snapshot into a readable structure.

## Deprecated symbols

- **GCGamepad**: The standard set of gamepad controls.
- **GCGamepadSnapshot**: A recording of all of the values provided by a [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCGamepad] object.
- **GCMicroGamepadSnapshot**: A recording of all of the values provided by a [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCMicroGamepad] object.
- **GCExtendedGamepadSnapshotData**
- **GCMicroGamepadSnapshotData**
- **GCExtendedGamepadSnapshotDataVersion**
- **GCMicroGamepadSnapshotDataVersion**
- **GCCurrentExtendedGamepadSnapshotDataVersion**
- **GCCurrentMicroGamepadSnapshotDataVersion**
- **GCExtendedGamepadSnapshotDataFromNSData(_:_:)**
- **GCMicroGamepadSnapshotDataFromNSData(_:_:)**
- **NSDataFromGCExtendedGamepadSnapshotData(_:)**
- **NSDataFromGCMicroGamepadSnapshotData(_:)**

## Inherits From

- GCExtendedGamepad

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
